main.name: Personal Website
main.description: I am a software engineer and I am currently pursuing my masters at San Francisco State University. I have over one year of work experience in CRM development, and I have made projects related to image processing and mobile application development.
main.bio: I am a software engineer and I am currently pursuing my masters at San Francisco State University. I have over one year of work experience in CRM development, and I have made projects related to machine learning, image processing and mobile application development. I have also multiple open-source projects in the node package manager.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

education.school: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology
education.degree: Bachelors in Information and Communication Technology
education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description1: Developed approximately 7 modules for more than 13 projects by building plugins and web resources using C# and JavaScript.
work.description2: Enhanced productivity of over 15 solution engineers by shipping continuous improvements to Microsoft Dynamics CRM technologies.
work.description3: Collaborated with over 6 teams to understand common customer problems and build solutions that tackle them.
work.description4: Reduced development periods by over 2 months by building reusable tools that manage data and optimize business processes.

work.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant, CSC 210 â€“ Introduction to Programming
work.description1: Introduced programming concepts to a class of 50 students by teaching them the Java programming language.
work.description2: Increased class participation and passing rate by 30% by initiating mentorship programs for student development.
work.description3: Helped students practice programming by creating 10 weekly assignments, 3 class projects, 2 exams, and 5 quizzes.

projects.name: Sports News Website
projects.tags: React.js, Node.js, MySQL, Google Cloud, JavaScript, SQL, Agile
projects.description1: Headed a team of 7 students to build a sports news web application that used React.js, Node.js, MySQL, and Google Cloud.
projects.description2: Built over 100 functional requirements by collaborating with developers using the Agile methodology.
projects.description3: Built highly available, low-latency APIs with a server response time averaging 100ms by implementing business logic through MySQL stored procedures, reducing overhead on the Node.js server.
projects.description4: Led the project to successful completion in 2 months by conducting daily standups, delegating tasks, and following best practices in software engineering.

projects.name: Air Quality Index Visualizer
projects.tags: Python, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, D3.js, Keras, SQL, MySQL, Google Cloud
projects.description1: Built a visualization system using React.js and D3.js that provides insights to air quality indexes of over 120 countries.
projects.description2: Visualized an air quality index dataset of over 5000 records by implementing bar charts, muti-series line charts, and choropleth maps.
projects.description3: Created an AQI prediction system with a 92% accuracy by using Keras to implement a deep neural network of over 40,000 parameters.

projects.name: Analysis of Convolutional Neural Networks and Optical Flow Algorithms
projects.description1: Analyzed tracking duration of CNNs and optical flow algorithms by testing them on 5000 frames of moving zebrafish.
projects.description2: Quantified tracking of optical flow algorithms using Python 3.7, where each algorithm averaged a 30-second tracking period.
projects.description3: Designed and implemented a CNN using Python 3.7, which averaged an 80-second tracking period.
projects.description4: Led the project to successful completion in 2 months by conducting daily standups, delegating tasks, and following best practices in software engineering.

projects.name: React-Native-Image-Filter-Android
projects.description1: Built a react native npm module that takes in an image and returns a filtered image. Built native modules using java, for performing different types of operations like grayscale, saturation, compression, rotation, cropping, colour filtering and contrast enhancement. Has reached over 1300 weekly downloads.

projects.name: React-Native-Build-Charts
projects.description1: Built a react native npm module that takes in data and returns a chart that plots that data. The different types of charts that can be plotted are a bar chart, pie chart and line chart. Built module using react-native-svg. Has reached over 500 weekly downloads.
